module Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grantee

-- | Contains information about the grantee.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newGrantee</a> smart constructor.
data Grantee
Grantee' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Type -> Grantee

-- | URI of the grantee group.
[$sel:uri:Grantee'] :: Grantee -> Maybe Text

-- | The canonical user ID of the grantee.
[$sel:id:Grantee'] :: Grantee -> Maybe Text

-- | Screen name of the grantee.
[$sel:displayName:Grantee'] :: Grantee -> Maybe Text

-- | Email address of the grantee.
[$sel:emailAddress:Grantee'] :: Grantee -> Maybe Text

-- | Type of grantee
[$sel:type':Grantee'] :: Grantee -> Type

-- | Create a value of <a>Grantee</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:uri:Grantee'</a>, <a>grantee_uri</a> - URI of the grantee
--   group.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Grantee'</a>, <a>grantee_id</a> - The canonical user ID of
--   the grantee.
--   
--   <a>$sel:displayName:Grantee'</a>, <a>grantee_displayName</a> - Screen
--   name of the grantee.
--   
--   <a>$sel:emailAddress:Grantee'</a>, <a>grantee_emailAddress</a> - Email
--   address of the grantee.
--   
--   <a>$sel:type':Grantee'</a>, <a>grantee_type</a> - Type of grantee
newGrantee :: Type -> Grantee

-- | URI of the grantee group.
grantee_uri :: Lens' Grantee (Maybe Text)

-- | The canonical user ID of the grantee.
grantee_id :: Lens' Grantee (Maybe Text)

-- | Screen name of the grantee.
grantee_displayName :: Lens' Grantee (Maybe Text)

-- | Email address of the grantee.
grantee_emailAddress :: Lens' Grantee (Maybe Text)

-- | Type of grantee
grantee_type :: Lens' Grantee Type
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grantee.Grantee
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grantee.Grantee
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grantee.Grantee
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grantee.Grantee
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grantee.Grantee
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grantee.Grantee
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grantee.Grantee
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grantee.Grantee


module Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grant

-- | Contains information about a grant.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newGrant</a> smart constructor.
data Grant
Grant' :: Maybe Grantee -> Maybe Permission -> Grant

-- | The grantee.
[$sel:grantee:Grant'] :: Grant -> Maybe Grantee

-- | Specifies the permission given to the grantee.
[$sel:permission:Grant'] :: Grant -> Maybe Permission

-- | Create a value of <a>Grant</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:grantee:Grant'</a>, <a>grant_grantee</a> - The grantee.
--   
--   <a>$sel:permission:Grant'</a>, <a>grant_permission</a> - Specifies the
--   permission given to the grantee.
newGrant :: Grant

-- | The grantee.
grant_grantee :: Lens' Grant (Maybe Grantee)

-- | Specifies the permission given to the grantee.
grant_permission :: Lens' Grant (Maybe Permission)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grant.Grant
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grant.Grant
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grant.Grant
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grant.Grant
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grant.Grant
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grant.Grant
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grant.Grant
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.Grant.Grant


module Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.S3Location

-- | Contains information about the location in Amazon S3 where the select
--   job results are stored.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newS3Location</a> smart constructor.
data S3Location
S3Location' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe CannedACL -> Maybe Encryption -> Maybe StorageClass -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe [Grant] -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> S3Location

-- | The name of the Amazon S3 bucket where the job results are stored.
[$sel:bucketName:S3Location'] :: S3Location -> Maybe Text

-- | The prefix that is prepended to the results for this request.
[$sel:prefix:S3Location'] :: S3Location -> Maybe Text

-- | The canned access control list (ACL) to apply to the job results.
[$sel:cannedACL:S3Location'] :: S3Location -> Maybe CannedACL

-- | Contains information about the encryption used to store the job
--   results in Amazon S3.
[$sel:encryption:S3Location'] :: S3Location -> Maybe Encryption

-- | The storage class used to store the job results.
[$sel:storageClass:S3Location'] :: S3Location -> Maybe StorageClass

-- | A map of metadata to store with the job results in Amazon S3.
[$sel:userMetadata:S3Location'] :: S3Location -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | A list of grants that control access to the staged results.
[$sel:accessControlList:S3Location'] :: S3Location -> Maybe [Grant]

-- | The tag-set that is applied to the job results.
[$sel:tagging:S3Location'] :: S3Location -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Create a value of <a>S3Location</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:bucketName:S3Location'</a>, <a>s3Location_bucketName</a> - The
--   name of the Amazon S3 bucket where the job results are stored.
--   
--   <a>$sel:prefix:S3Location'</a>, <a>s3Location_prefix</a> - The prefix
--   that is prepended to the results for this request.
--   
--   <a>$sel:cannedACL:S3Location'</a>, <a>s3Location_cannedACL</a> - The
--   canned access control list (ACL) to apply to the job results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:encryption:S3Location'</a>, <a>s3Location_encryption</a> -
--   Contains information about the encryption used to store the job
--   results in Amazon S3.
--   
--   <a>$sel:storageClass:S3Location'</a>, <a>s3Location_storageClass</a> -
--   The storage class used to store the job results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:userMetadata:S3Location'</a>, <a>s3Location_userMetadata</a> -
--   A map of metadata to store with the job results in Amazon S3.
--   
--   <a>$sel:accessControlList:S3Location'</a>,
--   <a>s3Location_accessControlList</a> - A list of grants that control
--   access to the staged results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tagging:S3Location'</a>, <a>s3Location_tagging</a> - The
--   tag-set that is applied to the job results.
newS3Location :: S3Location

-- | The name of the Amazon S3 bucket where the job results are stored.
s3Location_bucketName :: Lens' S3Location (Maybe Text)

-- | The prefix that is prepended to the results for this request.
s3Location_prefix :: Lens' S3Location (Maybe Text)

-- | The canned access control list (ACL) to apply to the job results.
s3Location_cannedACL :: Lens' S3Location (Maybe CannedACL)

-- | Contains information about the encryption used to store the job
--   results in Amazon S3.
s3Location_encryption :: Lens' S3Location (Maybe Encryption)

-- | The storage class used to store the job results.
s3Location_storageClass :: Lens' S3Location (Maybe StorageClass)

-- | A map of metadata to store with the job results in Amazon S3.
s3Location_userMetadata :: Lens' S3Location (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | A list of grants that control access to the staged results.
s3Location_accessControlList :: Lens' S3Location (Maybe [Grant])

-- | The tag-set that is applied to the job results.
s3Location_tagging :: Lens' S3Location (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.S3Location.S3Location
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.S3Location.S3Location
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.S3Location.S3Location
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.S3Location.S3Location
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.S3Location.S3Location
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.S3Location.S3Location
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.S3Location.S3Location
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.S3Location.S3Location


module Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.OutputLocation

-- | Contains information about the location where the select job results
--   are stored.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newOutputLocation</a> smart constructor.
data OutputLocation
OutputLocation' :: Maybe S3Location -> OutputLocation

-- | Describes an S3 location that will receive the results of the job
--   request.
[$sel:s3:OutputLocation'] :: OutputLocation -> Maybe S3Location

-- | Create a value of <a>OutputLocation</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:s3:OutputLocation'</a>, <a>outputLocation_s3</a> - Describes
--   an S3 location that will receive the results of the job request.
newOutputLocation :: OutputLocation

-- | Describes an S3 location that will receive the results of the job
--   request.
outputLocation_s3 :: Lens' OutputLocation (Maybe S3Location)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.OutputLocation.OutputLocation
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.OutputLocation.OutputLocation
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.OutputLocation.OutputLocation
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.OutputLocation.OutputLocation
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.OutputLocation.OutputLocation
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.OutputLocation.OutputLocation
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.OutputLocation.OutputLocation
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.OutputLocation.OutputLocation


module Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.JobParameters

-- | Provides options for defining a job.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newJobParameters</a> smart constructor.
data JobParameters
JobParameters' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe SelectParameters -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe InventoryRetrievalJobInput -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe OutputLocation -> JobParameters

-- | When initiating a job to retrieve a vault inventory, you can
--   optionally add this parameter to your request to specify the output
--   format. If you are initiating an inventory job and do not specify a
--   Format field, JSON is the default format. Valid values are "CSV" and
--   "JSON".
[$sel:format:JobParameters'] :: JobParameters -> Maybe Text

-- | The byte range to retrieve for an archive retrieval. in the form
--   "<i>StartByteValue</i>-<i>EndByteValue</i>" If not specified, the
--   whole archive is retrieved. If specified, the byte range must be
--   megabyte (1024*1024) aligned which means that <i>StartByteValue</i>
--   must be divisible by 1 MB and <i>EndByteValue</i> plus 1 must be
--   divisible by 1 MB or be the end of the archive specified as the
--   archive byte size value minus 1. If RetrievalByteRange is not megabyte
--   aligned, this operation returns a 400 response.
--   
--   An error occurs if you specify this field for an inventory retrieval
--   job request.
[$sel:retrievalByteRange:JobParameters'] :: JobParameters -> Maybe Text

-- | Contains the parameters that define a job.
[$sel:selectParameters:JobParameters'] :: JobParameters -> Maybe SelectParameters

-- | The Amazon SNS topic ARN to which Amazon S3 Glacier sends a
--   notification when the job is completed and the output is ready for you
--   to download. The specified topic publishes the notification to its
--   subscribers. The SNS topic must exist.
[$sel:sNSTopic:JobParameters'] :: JobParameters -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the archive that you want to retrieve. This field is
--   required only if <tt>Type</tt> is set to <tt>select</tt> or
--   <tt>archive-retrieval</tt>code&gt;. An error occurs if you specify
--   this request parameter for an inventory retrieval job request.
[$sel:archiveId:JobParameters'] :: JobParameters -> Maybe Text

-- | The optional description for the job. The description must be less
--   than or equal to 1,024 bytes. The allowable characters are 7-bit ASCII
--   without control codes-specifically, ASCII values 32-126 decimal or
--   0x20-0x7E hexadecimal.
[$sel:description:JobParameters'] :: JobParameters -> Maybe Text

-- | Input parameters used for range inventory retrieval.
[$sel:inventoryRetrievalParameters:JobParameters'] :: JobParameters -> Maybe InventoryRetrievalJobInput

-- | The job type. You can initiate a job to perform a select query on an
--   archive, retrieve an archive, or get an inventory of a vault. Valid
--   values are "select", "archive-retrieval" and "inventory-retrieval".
[$sel:type':JobParameters'] :: JobParameters -> Maybe Text

-- | The tier to use for a select or an archive retrieval job. Valid values
--   are <tt>Expedited</tt>, <tt>Standard</tt>, or <tt>Bulk</tt>.
--   <tt>Standard</tt> is the default.
[$sel:tier:JobParameters'] :: JobParameters -> Maybe Text

-- | Contains information about the location where the select job results
--   are stored.
[$sel:outputLocation:JobParameters'] :: JobParameters -> Maybe OutputLocation

-- | Create a value of <a>JobParameters</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:format:JobParameters'</a>, <a>jobParameters_format</a> - When
--   initiating a job to retrieve a vault inventory, you can optionally add
--   this parameter to your request to specify the output format. If you
--   are initiating an inventory job and do not specify a Format field,
--   JSON is the default format. Valid values are "CSV" and "JSON".
--   
--   <a>$sel:retrievalByteRange:JobParameters'</a>,
--   <a>jobParameters_retrievalByteRange</a> - The byte range to retrieve
--   for an archive retrieval. in the form
--   "<i>StartByteValue</i>-<i>EndByteValue</i>" If not specified, the
--   whole archive is retrieved. If specified, the byte range must be
--   megabyte (1024*1024) aligned which means that <i>StartByteValue</i>
--   must be divisible by 1 MB and <i>EndByteValue</i> plus 1 must be
--   divisible by 1 MB or be the end of the archive specified as the
--   archive byte size value minus 1. If RetrievalByteRange is not megabyte
--   aligned, this operation returns a 400 response.
--   
--   An error occurs if you specify this field for an inventory retrieval
--   job request.
--   
--   <a>$sel:selectParameters:JobParameters'</a>,
--   <a>jobParameters_selectParameters</a> - Contains the parameters that
--   define a job.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sNSTopic:JobParameters'</a>, <a>jobParameters_sNSTopic</a> -
--   The Amazon SNS topic ARN to which Amazon S3 Glacier sends a
--   notification when the job is completed and the output is ready for you
--   to download. The specified topic publishes the notification to its
--   subscribers. The SNS topic must exist.
--   
--   <a>$sel:archiveId:JobParameters'</a>, <a>jobParameters_archiveId</a> -
--   The ID of the archive that you want to retrieve. This field is
--   required only if <tt>Type</tt> is set to <tt>select</tt> or
--   <tt>archive-retrieval</tt>code&gt;. An error occurs if you specify
--   this request parameter for an inventory retrieval job request.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:JobParameters'</a>,
--   <a>jobParameters_description</a> - The optional description for the
--   job. The description must be less than or equal to 1,024 bytes. The
--   allowable characters are 7-bit ASCII without control
--   codes-specifically, ASCII values 32-126 decimal or 0x20-0x7E
--   hexadecimal.
--   
--   <a>$sel:inventoryRetrievalParameters:JobParameters'</a>,
--   <a>jobParameters_inventoryRetrievalParameters</a> - Input parameters
--   used for range inventory retrieval.
--   
--   <a>$sel:type':JobParameters'</a>, <a>jobParameters_type</a> - The job
--   type. You can initiate a job to perform a select query on an archive,
--   retrieve an archive, or get an inventory of a vault. Valid values are
--   "select", "archive-retrieval" and "inventory-retrieval".
--   
--   <a>$sel:tier:JobParameters'</a>, <a>jobParameters_tier</a> - The tier
--   to use for a select or an archive retrieval job. Valid values are
--   <tt>Expedited</tt>, <tt>Standard</tt>, or <tt>Bulk</tt>.
--   <tt>Standard</tt> is the default.
--   
--   <a>$sel:outputLocation:JobParameters'</a>,
--   <a>jobParameters_outputLocation</a> - Contains information about the
--   location where the select job results are stored.
newJobParameters :: JobParameters

-- | When initiating a job to retrieve a vault inventory, you can
--   optionally add this parameter to your request to specify the output
--   format. If you are initiating an inventory job and do not specify a
--   Format field, JSON is the default format. Valid values are "CSV" and
--   "JSON".
jobParameters_format :: Lens' JobParameters (Maybe Text)

-- | The byte range to retrieve for an archive retrieval. in the form
--   "<i>StartByteValue</i>-<i>EndByteValue</i>" If not specified, the
--   whole archive is retrieved. If specified, the byte range must be
--   megabyte (1024*1024) aligned which means that <i>StartByteValue</i>
--   must be divisible by 1 MB and <i>EndByteValue</i> plus 1 must be
--   divisible by 1 MB or be the end of the archive specified as the
--   archive byte size value minus 1. If RetrievalByteRange is not megabyte
--   aligned, this operation returns a 400 response.
--   
--   An error occurs if you specify this field for an inventory retrieval
--   job request.
jobParameters_retrievalByteRange :: Lens' JobParameters (Maybe Text)

-- | Contains the parameters that define a job.
jobParameters_selectParameters :: Lens' JobParameters (Maybe SelectParameters)

-- | The Amazon SNS topic ARN to which Amazon S3 Glacier sends a
--   notification when the job is completed and the output is ready for you
--   to download. The specified topic publishes the notification to its
--   subscribers. The SNS topic must exist.
jobParameters_sNSTopic :: Lens' JobParameters (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the archive that you want to retrieve. This field is
--   required only if <tt>Type</tt> is set to <tt>select</tt> or
--   <tt>archive-retrieval</tt>code&gt;. An error occurs if you specify
--   this request parameter for an inventory retrieval job request.
jobParameters_archiveId :: Lens' JobParameters (Maybe Text)

-- | The optional description for the job. The description must be less
--   than or equal to 1,024 bytes. The allowable characters are 7-bit ASCII
--   without control codes-specifically, ASCII values 32-126 decimal or
--   0x20-0x7E hexadecimal.
jobParameters_description :: Lens' JobParameters (Maybe Text)

-- | Input parameters used for range inventory retrieval.
jobParameters_inventoryRetrievalParameters :: Lens' JobParameters (Maybe InventoryRetrievalJobInput)

-- | The job type. You can initiate a job to perform a select query on an
--   archive, retrieve an archive, or get an inventory of a vault. Valid
--   values are "select", "archive-retrieval" and "inventory-retrieval".
jobParameters_type :: Lens' JobParameters (Maybe Text)

-- | The tier to use for a select or an archive retrieval job. Valid values
--   are <tt>Expedited</tt>, <tt>Standard</tt>, or <tt>Bulk</tt>.
--   <tt>Standard</tt> is the default.
jobParameters_tier :: Lens' JobParameters (Maybe Text)

-- | Contains information about the location where the select job results
--   are stored.
jobParameters_outputLocation :: Lens' JobParameters (Maybe OutputLocation)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.JobParameters.JobParameters
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.JobParameters.JobParameters
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.JobParameters.JobParameters
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.JobParameters.JobParameters
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.JobParameters.JobParameters
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.JobParameters.JobParameters
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.JobParameters.JobParameters


module Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.GlacierJobDescription

-- | Contains the description of an Amazon S3 Glacier job.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newGlacierJobDescription</a> smart constructor.
data GlacierJobDescription
GlacierJobDescription' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe SelectParameters -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe StatusCode -> Maybe Integer -> Maybe Integer -> Maybe ActionCode -> Maybe InventoryRetrievalJobDescription -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe OutputLocation -> GlacierJobDescription

-- | For an archive retrieval job, this value is the checksum of the
--   archive. Otherwise, this value is null.
--   
--   The SHA256 tree hash value for the requested range of an archive. If
--   the <b>InitiateJob</b> request for an archive specified a tree-hash
--   aligned range, then this field returns a value.
--   
--   If the whole archive is retrieved, this value is the same as the
--   ArchiveSHA256TreeHash value.
--   
--   This field is null for the following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>Archive retrieval jobs that specify a range that is not tree-hash
--   aligned</li>
--   <li>Archival jobs that specify a range that is equal to the whole
--   archive, when the job status is <tt>InProgress</tt></li>
--   <li>Inventory jobs</li>
--   <li>Select jobs</li>
--   </ul>
[$sel:sHA256TreeHash:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | A friendly message that describes the job status.
[$sel:statusMessage:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | The job description provided when initiating the job.
[$sel:jobDescription:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | The retrieved byte range for archive retrieval jobs in the form
--   <i>StartByteValue</i>-<i>EndByteValue</i>. If no range was specified
--   in the archive retrieval, then the whole archive is retrieved. In this
--   case, <i>StartByteValue</i> equals 0 and <i>EndByteValue</i> equals
--   the size of the archive minus 1. For inventory retrieval or select
--   jobs, this field is null.
[$sel:retrievalByteRange:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | Contains the job output location.
[$sel:jobOutputPath:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | The UTC date when the job was created. This value is a string
--   representation of ISO 8601 date format, for example
--   <tt>"2012-03-20T17:03:43.221Z"</tt>.
[$sel:creationDate:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | Contains the parameters used for a select.
[$sel:selectParameters:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe SelectParameters

-- | An Amazon SNS topic that receives notification.
[$sel:sNSTopic:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the vault from which an archive
--   retrieval was requested.
[$sel:vaultARN:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | The archive ID requested for a select job or archive retrieval.
--   Otherwise, this field is null.
[$sel:archiveId:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | The status code can be <tt>InProgress</tt>, <tt>Succeeded</tt>, or
--   <tt>Failed</tt>, and indicates the status of the job.
[$sel:statusCode:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe StatusCode

-- | For an inventory retrieval job, this value is the size in bytes of the
--   inventory requested for download. For an archive retrieval or select
--   job, this value is null.
[$sel:inventorySizeInBytes:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Integer

-- | For an archive retrieval job, this value is the size in bytes of the
--   archive being requested for download. For an inventory retrieval or
--   select job, this value is null.
[$sel:archiveSizeInBytes:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Integer

-- | The job type. This value is either <tt>ArchiveRetrieval</tt>,
--   <tt>InventoryRetrieval</tt>, or <tt>Select</tt>.
[$sel:action:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe ActionCode

-- | Parameters used for range inventory retrieval.
[$sel:inventoryRetrievalParameters:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe InventoryRetrievalJobDescription

-- | The UTC time that the job request completed. While the job is in
--   progress, the value is null.
[$sel:completionDate:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | The job status. When a job is completed, you get the job's output
--   using Get Job Output (GET output).
[$sel:completed:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Bool

-- | The SHA256 tree hash of the entire archive for an archive retrieval.
--   For inventory retrieval or select jobs, this field is null.
[$sel:archiveSHA256TreeHash:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | The tier to use for a select or an archive retrieval. Valid values are
--   <tt>Expedited</tt>, <tt>Standard</tt>, or <tt>Bulk</tt>.
--   <tt>Standard</tt> is the default.
[$sel:tier:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | An opaque string that identifies an Amazon S3 Glacier job.
[$sel:jobId:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe Text

-- | Contains the location where the data from the select job is stored.
[$sel:outputLocation:GlacierJobDescription'] :: GlacierJobDescription -> Maybe OutputLocation

-- | Create a value of <a>GlacierJobDescription</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:sHA256TreeHash:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_sHA256TreeHash</a> - For an archive retrieval
--   job, this value is the checksum of the archive. Otherwise, this value
--   is null.
--   
--   The SHA256 tree hash value for the requested range of an archive. If
--   the <b>InitiateJob</b> request for an archive specified a tree-hash
--   aligned range, then this field returns a value.
--   
--   If the whole archive is retrieved, this value is the same as the
--   ArchiveSHA256TreeHash value.
--   
--   This field is null for the following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>Archive retrieval jobs that specify a range that is not tree-hash
--   aligned</li>
--   <li>Archival jobs that specify a range that is equal to the whole
--   archive, when the job status is <tt>InProgress</tt></li>
--   <li>Inventory jobs</li>
--   <li>Select jobs</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   <a>$sel:statusMessage:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_statusMessage</a> - A friendly message that
--   describes the job status.
--   
--   <a>$sel:jobDescription:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_jobDescription</a> - The job description
--   provided when initiating the job.
--   
--   <a>$sel:retrievalByteRange:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_retrievalByteRange</a> - The retrieved byte
--   range for archive retrieval jobs in the form
--   <i>StartByteValue</i>-<i>EndByteValue</i>. If no range was specified
--   in the archive retrieval, then the whole archive is retrieved. In this
--   case, <i>StartByteValue</i> equals 0 and <i>EndByteValue</i> equals
--   the size of the archive minus 1. For inventory retrieval or select
--   jobs, this field is null.
--   
--   <a>$sel:jobOutputPath:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_jobOutputPath</a> - Contains the job output
--   location.
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationDate:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_creationDate</a> - The UTC date when the job
--   was created. This value is a string representation of ISO 8601 date
--   format, for example <tt>"2012-03-20T17:03:43.221Z"</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:selectParameters:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_selectParameters</a> - Contains the
--   parameters used for a select.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sNSTopic:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_sNSTopic</a> - An Amazon SNS topic that
--   receives notification.
--   
--   <a>$sel:vaultARN:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_vaultARN</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
--   of the vault from which an archive retrieval was requested.
--   
--   <a>$sel:archiveId:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_archiveId</a> - The archive ID requested for
--   a select job or archive retrieval. Otherwise, this field is null.
--   
--   <a>$sel:statusCode:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_statusCode</a> - The status code can be
--   <tt>InProgress</tt>, <tt>Succeeded</tt>, or <tt>Failed</tt>, and
--   indicates the status of the job.
--   
--   <a>$sel:inventorySizeInBytes:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_inventorySizeInBytes</a> - For an inventory
--   retrieval job, this value is the size in bytes of the inventory
--   requested for download. For an archive retrieval or select job, this
--   value is null.
--   
--   <a>$sel:archiveSizeInBytes:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_archiveSizeInBytes</a> - For an archive
--   retrieval job, this value is the size in bytes of the archive being
--   requested for download. For an inventory retrieval or select job, this
--   value is null.
--   
--   <a>$sel:action:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_action</a> - The job type. This value is
--   either <tt>ArchiveRetrieval</tt>, <tt>InventoryRetrieval</tt>, or
--   <tt>Select</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:inventoryRetrievalParameters:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_inventoryRetrievalParameters</a> - Parameters
--   used for range inventory retrieval.
--   
--   <a>$sel:completionDate:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_completionDate</a> - The UTC time that the
--   job request completed. While the job is in progress, the value is
--   null.
--   
--   <a>$sel:completed:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_completed</a> - The job status. When a job is
--   completed, you get the job's output using Get Job Output (GET output).
--   
--   <a>$sel:archiveSHA256TreeHash:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_archiveSHA256TreeHash</a> - The SHA256 tree
--   hash of the entire archive for an archive retrieval. For inventory
--   retrieval or select jobs, this field is null.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tier:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_tier</a> - The tier to use for a select or an
--   archive retrieval. Valid values are <tt>Expedited</tt>,
--   <tt>Standard</tt>, or <tt>Bulk</tt>. <tt>Standard</tt> is the default.
--   
--   <a>$sel:jobId:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_jobId</a> - An opaque string that identifies
--   an Amazon S3 Glacier job.
--   
--   <a>$sel:outputLocation:GlacierJobDescription'</a>,
--   <a>glacierJobDescription_outputLocation</a> - Contains the location
--   where the data from the select job is stored.
newGlacierJobDescription :: GlacierJobDescription

-- | For an archive retrieval job, this value is the checksum of the
--   archive. Otherwise, this value is null.
--   
--   The SHA256 tree hash value for the requested range of an archive. If
--   the <b>InitiateJob</b> request for an archive specified a tree-hash
--   aligned range, then this field returns a value.
--   
--   If the whole archive is retrieved, this value is the same as the
--   ArchiveSHA256TreeHash value.
--   
--   This field is null for the following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>Archive retrieval jobs that specify a range that is not tree-hash
--   aligned</li>
--   <li>Archival jobs that specify a range that is equal to the whole
--   archive, when the job status is <tt>InProgress</tt></li>
--   <li>Inventory jobs</li>
--   <li>Select jobs</li>
--   </ul>
glacierJobDescription_sHA256TreeHash :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | A friendly message that describes the job status.
glacierJobDescription_statusMessage :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | The job description provided when initiating the job.
glacierJobDescription_jobDescription :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | The retrieved byte range for archive retrieval jobs in the form
--   <i>StartByteValue</i>-<i>EndByteValue</i>. If no range was specified
--   in the archive retrieval, then the whole archive is retrieved. In this
--   case, <i>StartByteValue</i> equals 0 and <i>EndByteValue</i> equals
--   the size of the archive minus 1. For inventory retrieval or select
--   jobs, this field is null.
glacierJobDescription_retrievalByteRange :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | Contains the job output location.
glacierJobDescription_jobOutputPath :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | The UTC date when the job was created. This value is a string
--   representation of ISO 8601 date format, for example
--   <tt>"2012-03-20T17:03:43.221Z"</tt>.
glacierJobDescription_creationDate :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | Contains the parameters used for a select.
glacierJobDescription_selectParameters :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe SelectParameters)

-- | An Amazon SNS topic that receives notification.
glacierJobDescription_sNSTopic :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the vault from which an archive
--   retrieval was requested.
glacierJobDescription_vaultARN :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | The archive ID requested for a select job or archive retrieval.
--   Otherwise, this field is null.
glacierJobDescription_archiveId :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | The status code can be <tt>InProgress</tt>, <tt>Succeeded</tt>, or
--   <tt>Failed</tt>, and indicates the status of the job.
glacierJobDescription_statusCode :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe StatusCode)

-- | For an inventory retrieval job, this value is the size in bytes of the
--   inventory requested for download. For an archive retrieval or select
--   job, this value is null.
glacierJobDescription_inventorySizeInBytes :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Integer)

-- | For an archive retrieval job, this value is the size in bytes of the
--   archive being requested for download. For an inventory retrieval or
--   select job, this value is null.
glacierJobDescription_archiveSizeInBytes :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Integer)

-- | The job type. This value is either <tt>ArchiveRetrieval</tt>,
--   <tt>InventoryRetrieval</tt>, or <tt>Select</tt>.
glacierJobDescription_action :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe ActionCode)

-- | Parameters used for range inventory retrieval.
glacierJobDescription_inventoryRetrievalParameters :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe InventoryRetrievalJobDescription)

-- | The UTC time that the job request completed. While the job is in
--   progress, the value is null.
glacierJobDescription_completionDate :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | The job status. When a job is completed, you get the job's output
--   using Get Job Output (GET output).
glacierJobDescription_completed :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Bool)

-- | The SHA256 tree hash of the entire archive for an archive retrieval.
--   For inventory retrieval or select jobs, this field is null.
glacierJobDescription_archiveSHA256TreeHash :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | The tier to use for a select or an archive retrieval. Valid values are
--   <tt>Expedited</tt>, <tt>Standard</tt>, or <tt>Bulk</tt>.
--   <tt>Standard</tt> is the default.
glacierJobDescription_tier :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | An opaque string that identifies an Amazon S3 Glacier job.
glacierJobDescription_jobId :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe Text)

-- | Contains the location where the data from the select job is stored.
glacierJobDescription_outputLocation :: Lens' GlacierJobDescription (Maybe OutputLocation)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.GlacierJobDescription.GlacierJobDescription
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.GlacierJobDescription.GlacierJobDescription
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.GlacierJobDescription.GlacierJobDescription
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.GlacierJobDescription.GlacierJobDescription
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.GlacierJobDescription.GlacierJobDescription
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.GlacierJobDescription.GlacierJobDescription
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.GlacierJobDescription.GlacierJobDescription


module Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.UploadListElement

-- | A list of in-progress multipart uploads for a vault.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newUploadListElement</a> smart constructor.
data UploadListElement
UploadListElement' :: Maybe Integer -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> UploadListElement

-- | The part size, in bytes, specified in the Initiate Multipart Upload
--   request. This is the size of all the parts in the upload except the
--   last part, which may be smaller than this size.
[$sel:partSizeInBytes:UploadListElement'] :: UploadListElement -> Maybe Integer

-- | The UTC time at which the multipart upload was initiated.
[$sel:creationDate:UploadListElement'] :: UploadListElement -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the vault that contains the archive.
[$sel:vaultARN:UploadListElement'] :: UploadListElement -> Maybe Text

-- | The description of the archive that was specified in the Initiate
--   Multipart Upload request.
[$sel:archiveDescription:UploadListElement'] :: UploadListElement -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of a multipart upload.
[$sel:multipartUploadId:UploadListElement'] :: UploadListElement -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>UploadListElement</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:partSizeInBytes:UploadListElement'</a>,
--   <a>uploadListElement_partSizeInBytes</a> - The part size, in bytes,
--   specified in the Initiate Multipart Upload request. This is the size
--   of all the parts in the upload except the last part, which may be
--   smaller than this size.
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationDate:UploadListElement'</a>,
--   <a>uploadListElement_creationDate</a> - The UTC time at which the
--   multipart upload was initiated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:vaultARN:UploadListElement'</a>,
--   <a>uploadListElement_vaultARN</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of
--   the vault that contains the archive.
--   
--   <a>$sel:archiveDescription:UploadListElement'</a>,
--   <a>uploadListElement_archiveDescription</a> - The description of the
--   archive that was specified in the Initiate Multipart Upload request.
--   
--   <a>$sel:multipartUploadId:UploadListElement'</a>,
--   <a>uploadListElement_multipartUploadId</a> - The ID of a multipart
--   upload.
newUploadListElement :: UploadListElement

-- | The part size, in bytes, specified in the Initiate Multipart Upload
--   request. This is the size of all the parts in the upload except the
--   last part, which may be smaller than this size.
uploadListElement_partSizeInBytes :: Lens' UploadListElement (Maybe Integer)

-- | The UTC time at which the multipart upload was initiated.
uploadListElement_creationDate :: Lens' UploadListElement (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the vault that contains the archive.
uploadListElement_vaultARN :: Lens' UploadListElement (Maybe Text)

-- | The description of the archive that was specified in the Initiate
--   Multipart Upload request.
uploadListElement_archiveDescription :: Lens' UploadListElement (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of a multipart upload.
uploadListElement_multipartUploadId :: Lens' UploadListElement (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.UploadListElement.UploadListElement
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.UploadListElement.UploadListElement
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.UploadListElement.UploadListElement
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.UploadListElement.UploadListElement
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.UploadListElement.UploadListElement
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.UploadListElement.UploadListElement
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.UploadListElement.UploadListElement

module Network.AWS.Glacier.Types.VaultNotificationConfig

-- | Represents a vault's notification configuration.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newVaultNotificationConfig</a> smart constructor.
data VaultNotificationConfig
VaultNotificationConfig' :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> VaultNotificationConfig

-- | A list of one or more events for which Amazon S3 Glacier will send a
--   notification to the specified Amazon SNS topic.
[$sel:events:VaultNotificationConfig'] :: VaultNotificationConfig -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic Amazon
--   Resource Name (ARN).
[$sel:sNSTopic:VaultNotificationConfig'] :: VaultNotificationConfig -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>VaultNotificationConfig</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--

--   <a>vaultNotificationConfig_events</a> - A list of one or more events
--   for which Amazon S3 Glacier will send a notification to the specified
--   Amazon SNS topic.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sNSTopic:VaultNotificationConfig'</a>,
--   <a>vaultNotificationConfig_sNSTopic</a> - The Amazon Simple
--   Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic Amazon Resource Name (ARN).
newVaultNotificationConfig :: VaultNotificationConfig

-- | A list of one or more events for which Amazon S3 Glacier will send a
--   notification to the specified Amazon SNS topic.
vaultNotificationConfig_events :: Lens' VaultNotificationConfig (Maybe [Text])

-- | The Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic Amazon
--   Resource Name (ARN).
vaultNotificationConfig_sNSTopic :: Lens' VaultNotificationConfig (Maybe Text)
